doc.field: 1 mounted gelatin silver print, 13 1/2 x 10 1/2 in., of John Iannuzzi fleeing a fire at 572 President Street in Brooklyn, carrrying his caged parrot, Bobo; photograph is entitled Polly Wanna Cracker, Untoasted. Published newspaper clipping from the Daily News including the photograph is mounted on the verso.

1 mounted gelatin silver print, 13 1/2 x 10 1/2 in., of John Iannuzzi fleeing a fire at 572 President Street in Brooklyn, carrrying his caged parrot, Bobo; photograph is entitled Polly Wanna Cracker, Untoasted. Published newspaper clipping from the Daily News including the photograph is mounted on the verso.
